title: Fire Extinguisher
desc:
Post 1772
- For every card in the next person's hand to have any of the following colors ( <:red:1106234051129507932>, <:inferno:1118594776716021780>, <:orange:1106716206905438231>, <:yellow:1106234135384699023>), they gain 4 **Card Shards**.
- They discard the cards that had the above colors.
